member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Attributes.BaseServiceAttribute
member.summary: Easy base type for custom attributes.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Attributes.ConfigRequiredAttribute
member.summary: The configuration property is required for the service to function.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Attributes.DaprControllerAttribute
member.summary: Attribute for locating Dapr controller API classes for a given service.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Attributes.DaprControllerAttribute.InterfaceType
member.summary: Service type this controller is for. If it's independent of any services, leave null. If requiring multiple service, add more attributes.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Attributes.DaprRouteAttribute
member.summary: Attribute to specify endpoints used for dapr service.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Attributes.DaprServiceAttribute
member.summary: Attribute for auto-loading dapr services. Use {Name}_SERVICE_ENABLE as ENV or switch to enable/disable.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Attributes.DaprServiceAttribute.InterfaceType
member.summary:
IDaprService interface type. Must implement/inherit IDaprService. Can be an interface, abstract or concrete class. If null, will use exact class type.
MUST match the service pulled from DI in related controllers.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Attributes.DaprServiceAttribute.Lifetime
member.summary: How long the service instance lasts. - Transient - One instance per service/reference. - Scoped - One instance per request. - Singleton - Only one instance, re-used each request.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Attributes.DaprServiceAttribute.Priority
member.summary: Automatic priority over any other handlers.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Attributes.DaprServiceAttribute.Name
member.summary: Name of the service.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Attributes.HeaderArrayAttribute
member.summary: Attribute to propagate common headers through dapr requests.

member.summary: Attribute attached to the service.

member.summary: Attribute for marking methods as service mapping event handlers. Provides metadata for automatic registration with the service mapping event system.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Attributes.ServiceMappingEventAttribute.Action
member.summary: The action this handler responds to (register, update, unregister, or * for all).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Attributes.ServiceMappingEventAttribute.ServiceName
member.summary: Optional service name filter. If specified, only handles events for this service. Use "*" or null to handle events for all services.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Attributes.ServiceMappingEventAttribute.Priority
member.summary: Priority for handler execution when multiple handlers match (lower = higher priority).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Attributes.ServiceMappingEventAttribute.RunAsync
member.summary: Whether this handler should run asynchronously with other handlers.

member.summary: Creates a new service mapping handler attribute.

member.summary: Set to override GUID for administrative service endpoints. If not set, will generate a new GUID automatically on service startup.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Configuration.BaseServiceConfiguration.Service_Disabled
member.summary: Whether the service has been disabled. Services are enabled by default, and the attempt should be made to include/exclude by assemblies instead. This means services are enabled so long as their assemblies are loaded.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ExtensionMethods.REGEX_InvalidChars
member.remarks:
Pattern:
[^a-zA-Z0-9\\s-]
Explanation:
○ Match a character in the set [^-0-9A-Za-z\s].

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ExtensionMethods.REGEX_Spaces
member.remarks:
Pattern:
\\s
Explanation:
○ Match a whitespace character.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ExtensionMethods.REGEX_MultipleSpaces
member.remarks:
Pattern:
\\s+
Explanation:
○ Match a whitespace character atomically at least once.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.IServiceAppMappingResolver
member.summary: Resolves service names to Dapr app-ids for distributed service routing. Supports dynamic mapping via RabbitMQ events for production scaling.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.IServiceAppMappingResolver.GetAppIdForService(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the Dapr app-id for the specified service name. Defaults to "bannou" (omnipotent local node) but can be overridden by service mapping events from RabbitMQ.
member.returns: The Dapr app-id to route requests to

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.IServiceAppMappingResolver.UpdateServiceMapping(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Updates the service mapping from RabbitMQ service discovery events.
member.param: The Dapr app-id where this service is running

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.IServiceAppMappingResolver.RemoveServiceMapping(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a service mapping (when service goes offline).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.IServiceAppMappingResolver.GetAllMappings
member.summary: Gets all current service mappings for debugging/monitoring.
member.returns: Dictionary of service name to app-id mappings

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceAppMappingResolver
member.summary: Default implementation of service-to-app-id mapping with dynamic updates via RabbitMQ. Defaults to "bannou" (omnipotent local node) for all services, but can be dynamically updated based on service discovery events for distributed production deployments.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceAppMappingResolver.GetAppIdForService(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the Dapr app-id for the specified service. Defaults to "bannou" but can be overridden by RabbitMQ service mapping events.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceAppMappingResolver.UpdateServiceMapping(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Updates service mapping from RabbitMQ service discovery events.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceAppMappingResolver.RemoveServiceMapping(System.String)
member.summary: Removes service mapping when service goes offline.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceAppMappingResolver.GetAllMappings
member.summary: Gets all current service mappings for debugging/monitoring.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceClientExtensions
member.summary: Dependency injection extensions for registering Dapr-aware service clients. Provides dynamic app-id resolution with default "bannou" routing.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceClientExtensions.AddServiceAppMappingResolver(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Registers the service app mapping resolver as a singleton. This resolver handles dynamic service-to-app-id mapping via RabbitMQ events.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceClientExtensions.AddDaprServiceClient``2(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.String,System.Action{System.Net.Http.HttpClient})
member.summary: Registers a Dapr-aware service client with automatic HttpClient configuration. The client uses dynamic app-id resolution defaulting to "bannou".
member.param: The service name for app-id resolution (e.g., "accounts")

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceClientExtensions.AddDaprServiceClients(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.ValueTuple{System.Type,System.Type,System.String}[])
member.summary: Registers multiple Dapr service clients at once for convenience. Uses service name derived from client type name (e.g., AccountsClient -> "accounts").

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceClientExtensions.AddAllDaprServiceClients(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Auto-registers all service clients found in the current assembly. Follows naming convention: {Service}Client implements I{Service}Client. Service name is derived by removing "Client" suffix and converting to lowercase.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceClientsDependencyInjection
member.summary: Extension methods for registering all service client infrastructure. This includes Dapr service clients, event handling, and service mapping.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceClientsDependencyInjection.AddBannouServiceClients(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Registers the complete Bannou service client infrastructure. Includes Dapr clients, service mapping, events, and lifecycle management.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceClientsDependencyInjection.AddAllBannouServiceClients(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Registers all discovered Dapr service clients automatically. Uses reflection to find all {Service}Client classes and registers them with DI.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceClientsDependencyInjection.AddSpecificServiceClients(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.ValueTuple{System.Type,System.Type,System.String}[])
member.summary: Registers specific service clients manually for more control.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.IServiceMappingEventDispatcher
member.summary: Dispatches service mapping events to registered handlers using reflection and attributes. Provides a clean, declarative way to handle service mapping events.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.IServiceMappingEventDispatcher.DispatchEventAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceMappingEvent,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Dispatches a service mapping event to all matching handlers.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.IServiceMappingEventDispatcher.GetRegisteredHandlers
member.summary: Gets information about all registered handlers for debugging.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceMappingEventDispatcher
member.summary: Default implementation of service mapping event dispatcher.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceMappingHandlerInfo
member.summary: Information about a registered service mapping event handler.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceMappingEventHandler
member.summary: Handles service mapping events from RabbitMQ via Dapr pub/sub. Updates the dynamic service-to-app-id mapping based on service discovery events.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceMappingEventHandler.HandleServiceMappingEventAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceMappingEvent)
member.summary: Handles service mapping events from the bannou-service-mappings topic. These events update the dynamic routing table for distributed services.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceMappingEventHandler.GetHealth
member.summary: Health check endpoint for service mapping event handling.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceMappingEvent
member.summary: Service mapping event data model. Represents changes in service-to-app-id mappings for distributed deployment.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceMappingEvent.EventId
member.summary: Unique identifier for this event.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceMappingEvent.Timestamp
member.summary: When the event occurred.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceMappingEvent.ServiceName
member.summary: Name of the service (e.g., "accounts", "character-agent").

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceMappingEvent.AppId
member.summary: Dapr app-id where the service is running.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceMappingEvent.Action
member.summary: Type of mapping change: register, update, unregister.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceMappingEvent.Metadata
member.summary: Additional service metadata (optional).

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.IServiceMappingEventPublisher
member.summary: Publisher for service mapping events via Dapr pub/sub to RabbitMQ. Announces service registration, updates, and shutdowns for dynamic routing.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.IServiceMappingEventPublisher.AnnounceServiceStartupAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Announces that a service is starting and should be mapped to this app-id.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.IServiceMappingEventPublisher.AnnounceServiceShutdownAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Announces that a service is shutting down and should be unmapped.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.IServiceMappingEventPublisher.UpdateServiceMappingAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Updates service mapping (for configuration changes or health status updates).

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceMappingEventPublisher
member.summary: Default implementation of service mapping event publisher using Dapr.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ServiceClients.ServiceMappingLifecycleService
member.summary: Background service that automatically announces service startup and shutdown events. Integrates with ASP.NET Core hosting lifecycle to manage service mappings.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Services.DaprService
member.summary: Optional base type for service handlers.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Services.DaprService`1
member.summary: Optional generic base type for service handlers. Automatically initializes the proper configuration.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Services.IDaprService
member.summary:
Interface to implement for all internal dapr service, which provides the logic for any given set of APIs.
For example, the Inventory service is in charge of any API calls that desire to create/modify inventory data in the game.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Services.IDaprService.ServiceAppMappings
member.summary: Lookup for mapping applications to services in the Dapr network. Is applied as an override to hardcoded and configurable network_mode presets.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Services.IDaprService.NetworkModePresets
member.summary:
The service->application name mappings for the network. Specific to the network mode that's been configured.
Set the `NETWORK_MODE` ENV or `--network-mode` switch to select the preset mappings to use.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Services.IDaprService.IsDisabled
member.summary: Returns whether the configuration indicates the service should be disabled.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Services.IDaprService.GetConfigurationType
member.summary: Returns the best configuration type for this service type.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Services.IDaprService.HasRequiredConfiguration
member.summary: Returns whether the configuration is provided for a service to run properly.

member.summary: Returns whether the configuration is provided for a given service type to run properly.

member.summary: Returns whether the configuration is provided for a given service type to run properly.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Services.IDaprService.GetConfigurationType(System.Type)
member.summary: Returns the best service configuration type for the given service type. Returned type is based on DaprServiceAttribute service target type.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Services.IDaprService.IsAnyEnabled
member.summary: Returns whether the configuration indicates ANY services should be enabled.

member.summary: Returns whether the configuration indicates the service should be enabled.

member.summary: Returns whether the configuration indicates the service should be disabled.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Services.IDaprService.IsDisabled(System.String)
member.summary: Returns whether the configuration indicates the service should be disabled.

member.summary: Find the highest priority/derived service type with the given name.
member.returns: Interface Type, Implementation Type, Service Attribute

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Services.IDaprService.GetServiceInfo(System.Type)
member.summary: Find the implementation for the given service handler.
member.returns: Interface Type, Implementation Type, Service Attribute

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Services.IDaprService.GetPresetAppNameFromServiceName(System.String)
member.summary:
Returns the application name mapped for the given service name, from the network mode preset.
Set the `NETWORK_MODE` ENV or `--network-mode` switch to select the preset mappings to use.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Services.IDaprService.GetAppByServiceInterfaceType(System.Type)
member.summary: Get the app name for the given service interface type.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Services.IDaprService.GetAppByServiceImplementationType(System.Type)
member.summary: Get the app name for the given service implementation type.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Services.IDaprService.GetAppByServiceName(System.String)
member.summary:
Get the app name for the given service name.
The service name is primarily obtained from the DaprService attribute attached to the implementation type.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Services.ServiceResponse
member.summary: The standard service function response. Adoption for all service functions means API controllers can use switches to handle a wider range of standard status reports than just "no object returned", without needing additional out parameters.

member.summary: The standard service function response. Adoption for all service functions means API controllers can use switches to handle a wider range of standard status reports than just "no object returned", without needing additional out parameters.
